My DiaLoG WiTh LanA

Lana.. babe R u Ok?
-well...i have to tell u something..
Yo: really?
Lana: yep..u have a girl.. well a "friend" named Ana Lucia.. don't u?
Yo: aja.. well..that's the prob?
Lana: yes!!! u love her!!! u don't love me!!!!
Yo: WAT!! u insane or wat!!!??? she's my best friend!! she's beautiful, smart, funny, she's nice, N yes i love her, but we'r talking! about us!! how can u possibly think! i have a romance with her!!!
Lana: ...really? u don't love her like u love me?
YO: noo babe, u R mine, u R my wife, my babe, my love, my woman...I want u to be with me forever!
Lana: really!!!??, ok but Ana...
Yo: she's fine, she will be my friend my "miguita" forever, 'cause i really lover, she's the best girl I ever met!
Lana: Wat is that mean!!!
Yo: that she's unique jus like u babe! I Love u, N it will be like that forever
Lana: ohhhh!
Lana+yo:

FaR AWay FroM LovE

only heaven knows that without u!!! babe, honey, it's how the lord disappear, it's how I can be hurt, the only way i can be hurt, well, it's time to say bye, ur so far away from my arms... it's that something bad?, it's really that bad? Lord Valtiel, Lord Samael, can encounter heaven, i'll face lady deathn lady earth to find u babe, someday I will, it's a promise
